name: Porygon-Z
author: GOSSAN
flavor_text: Some say an additional program made this Pokémon evolve, but even academics can’t agree on whether Porygon-Z is really an evolution.

abilities.name: Buggy Turbo
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, attach up to 4 Basic Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon. If tails, discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energized Attack
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon.
